mapper.sql: select r.rno, r.rtit, r.redu, r.rcar, r.rkind, r.rimg, r.rqua, r.rlang, r.raward, r.rmaj, r.rsch, r.rgpa, r.rcnt, r.ravi, r.rfile, r.rnote, r.rcheck, r.ino
mapper.select: from g_res r left join g_iper i on r.ino = i.ino order by r.rno desc limit #{startIndex}, #{size}
mapper.insert: insert into g_res(rtit, redu, rcar, rkind, rimg, rqua, rlang, raward, rmaj, rsch, rgpa, rcnt, ravi, rfile, rnote, rcheck, ino) values(#{title},#{education},#{career},#{kind},#{image},#{qualification},#{language},#{award},#{major},#{schoolName},#{grades},0,#{avi},#{file},#{note},#{check},#{member.no})
mapper.update: update g_res set rtit=#{title}, redu=#{education}, rcar=#{career}, rkind=#{kind}, rimg=if(#{image} = '', rimg, #{image}), rqua=#{qualification}, rlang=#{language}, raward=#{award}, rmaj=#{major}, rsch=#{schoolName}, rgpa=#{grades}, ravi=if(#{avi} = '', ravi, #{avi}), rfile=if(#{file} = '', rfile, #{file}), rnote=#{note}, rcheck=#{check} where rno=#{no}
